CustomField.formula: IF((ISBLANK(Lead_Closed_date__c)), ((floor((now() - CreatedDate)*24)) + (((((now() - CreatedDate)*24)-floor((now() - CreatedDate)*24))*60)/100))/24 ,((floor((Lead_Closed_date__c - CreatedDate)*24)) + (((((Lead_Closed_date__c - CreatedDate)*24)-floor((Lead_Closed_date__c - CreatedDate)*24))*60)/100))/24)
CustomField.label: Lead Age
